short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the scores on apple's MLS Season Pass streaming site. Just don't show 'em.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide all of the scores for past and live games on Apple's MLS streaming site. (https://tv.apple.com/us/channel/mls-season-pass).

The iDevice apps have options to hide the scores but, at the time of publishing this extension, there is no way to make them go away if you're using a regular web browser. Now there is.

This is a simple CSS modification with no javascript; no data are collected, stored, transmitted, wrangled, finagled, poked, prodded, or peeked at by this extension.
